pullRequest.title: [IPC part 2] Refactor content provider strategy
pullRequest.bodyText:
part 1: #1088

Add ContentProviderStrategy (mostly extracted from BrokerContentProviderStrategy, which is now gone).
Make some changes on how the  interactiveRequest response is handled.

In Bound Service, Broker would return an Intent, containing a bundle inside it.
In ContentProvider, Broker would return the bundle only.
To standardize the logic (without making changes to the protocol itself), I'll be extracting the bundle from the intent in the bound service case, after that, we'll treat all strategy the same - constructing an intent from the bundle.
